predicate.note: Frames file for 'pattern' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry.

roleset.name: copy, as if following a pattern

example.name: passive
example.text: This week, New York City announced a 10-point policy patterned *trace* on the federal bill of rights for taxpayers.
example.arg: the federal bill of rights for taxpayers

example.name: active, different preposition
example.text: John patterned his behavior after Mary's less-violent tendencies.
